content.html: 19 years ago Big Brother UK was won by trans woman Nadia Almada, with 74% of the final vote. Today, a trans person only has to appear on a tv programme for 10 minutes and the internet is filled with hatred for days. Trans people haven’t changed, the hatred has
content.value:
19 years ago Big Brother UK was won by trans woman Nadia Almada, with 74% of the final vote. 

Today, a trans person only has to appear on a tv programme for 10 minutes and the internet is filled with hatred for days. Trans people haven’t changed, the hatred has
